DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect chiropractic treatment without use acupressure pillow cervical headache . Subjects randomly allocate group without pillow follow five week . The primary outcome measure headache frequency . The investigator predict group use pillow daily basis demonstrate significantly great decrease headache frequency 5-week interval .
DOC.criteria: male female age 2160 recurrent headache suboccipital tenderness minimum 4 headache per month migraine aura sinus headache organic pathology contraindication cervical manipulation
